Spark your next idea with AI
Spark is an AI-powered chord trigger with infinite possibilities. Ask for chords in any style you want, and they'll be instantly generated to use in your DAW.
Free Download Sign up for free credits
Text to chord generation
Spark is more than just a MIDI chord trigger. It’s an intelligent AI music collaborator that can generate endless chord progressions that match your creative vision. Whether you're looking for jazz harmonies or chords in the style of an artist, Spark can generate anything you ask for.
Playstyle controls
Control the velocity and strum of the notes. Add humanization to bring the chords to life and adjust the values to add more character.
Capture MIDI in your DAW
Trigger chords with a single key on your keyboard and record MIDI into your DAW for further exploration and arrangement.
Modify chords
Spark isn’t just a tool, it’s your AI companion. Ask it to make modifications or generate variations of the chords it produces. Overcome writers block and unleash your creativity.
